mapper.update:
UPDATE data_league_re_club SET
data_league_re_club.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_league_re_club.LeagueId = #{ leagueId },
data_league_re_club.LeagueName = #{ leagueName },
data_league_re_club.Year = #{ year },
data_league_re_club.Honors = #{ honors },
data_league_re_club.DisplayOrder = #{ displayOrder },
data_league_re_club.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_league_re_club.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
